snippet.title: Sub-Verge Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Conversation is a dangerous game. Manipulate a fractured band of renegade divers to reach the depths of this short narrative puzzle. Uncover alliances and expose betrayals — before something horrific from the dark abyss silences you all. Don’t let the conversation get too deep.

Coming to Steam and Itch.io on May 1st - wishlist now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3487020/SubVerge

Sign up for updates, and choose your allegiance for an exclusive Discord Role:
https://www.pantaloon.io/sub-verge

Join the conversation: 
https://discord.com/invite/GshQKAEY4P?_kx=_NEZvoNKZfV4cXEX5IMHEg%3D%3D.VxpbwG
